name: Upgraded
description: Upgraded users can create unlimited cards

name: Spectators
description: Spectators can view public spaces, and add cards to open spaces

name: GuideMaker
description: Guide Makers have written helpful guides about their spaces on the Kinopio blog

name: Donor
description: Donors have supported the sustainable development of Kinopio through a generous donation

name: Ambassador
description: Friends of Kinopio that share how they use Kinopio with the world
